pages.text: $(li)Warped Fungus on a Stick can be used to control $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/strider)Striders$(/l).$(br)$(li)To ride it, first you have to equip a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) to this creature.
pages.title: Warped F. on a Stick

pages.text: $(li)Then, right click to this creature to ride it.$(br)$(li)Now, just hold the Warped Fungus on a Stick in your hand to make walk your Strider in any direction.$(br)$(li)Thanks to this, you will now be able to move through the lava in the Nether.
